framework

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentReferences
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExternalInformationPortController, InputOutputHandlerController, KeyGeneratorController, MessageProcessorController, NetworkClockController, OutputStrategyController, UserDatabaseController

    public abstract class Controller
extends Object
implements ComponentReferences
    The abstract class Controller provides all methods, interfaces and fields that are needed by every controller. This class provides a skeleton for the controllers, which enables access to all other controllers and the mix. Furthermore the internal classes Logger and Settings are available.
    Author:
    Daniel Kaiser
